remarks: The ` QQHom ` homomorphism is a group homomorphism if the target structure is a division ring.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Nov-2017.)
statement:
qqhval2.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
qqhval2.1 $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.

qqhrhm.1 $e |- Q = ( CCfld |`s QQ ) $.
qqhghm $p |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) -> ( QQHom ` R ) e. ( Q GrpHom R ) ) $.
